title: Samuraider: Nazo no Tenkousei
synopsis: In a combination of samurai movies and Bomber Bikers of Shonan, Tokyo street punk Masao buys a treasured FZR "katana" motorcycle and becomes a knight of the road, attacking criminals with a genuine katana sword.
staff: [['Ooba, Hideaki', ['Director']], ['Taniguchi, Moriyasu', ['Assistant Director', ' Character Design']], ['Matsumiya, Masazumi', ['Art Director']]]
